name: Annette World
description:
DISCLAIMER: IN THIS GAME THERE ARE SOME NSFW SCENES AND STRONG LANGUAGE, NOT FOR KIDS!

Annette World is our second RPG game and fourth game overall.

we worked on this game for several months, principally the 5 last months of the year 2022 and published this on the first day of the year. 

this project was based on a webcomic that i (Giag) made in summer 2022 and then scrapped, because i haven't time to work on it.

Annette is a young witch coming from a planet of witches. she is lesbian and wants to make new friends in her adventure, in which a dark secret must be unfolded.  start now this funny and anime-esque adventure full of weird foes and new, cute friends!
